headline: Occidental Petroleum: Will Buffett's Endorsement Be Enough To Overshadow High Debt?
summary: In Q1 2025, Occidental Petroleum had a 58.68% liabilities-to-assets ratio, indicating that more than half of the company is composed of debt.
